attributes.action: make it illegal to burn palm oil and other foreign grown vegetable oils in power stations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The burning of vegetable oils in huge quantities to generate electricity is causing the deforestation of vast tracts of rain forest in the Far East which is releasing more Carbon Dioxide into the atmosphere than will ever be saved by the substitution of fossil fuels by these oils.  Large numbers of people are being driven off their land without compensation in order to create the necessary plantations and left in poverty, compounding the environmental damage.
